/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the energy and dynamism of the city.
